Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Interfaces
  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Enums
  • Deprecated Annotation Types
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Constructors
  • Deprecated Annotation Type Elements
  • Deprecated Interfaces 
    Interface and Description
    org.hibernate.search.engine.BoostStrategy
    Index-time boosting will not be possible anymore starting from Lucene 7. You should use query-time boosting instead, for instance by calling boostedTo(float) when building queries with the Hibernate Search query DSL.
    org.hibernate.search.query.facet.FacetSelection
    Support for facet selection ("drill-down") will be removed in Hibernate Search 6. In order to drill-down and have your query return only specific facets, wrap it in a boolean query and add a filter clause to constraint values of the facet field with either a keyword query or a range query. See also this section of the migration guide.
    org.hibernate.search.store.IndexShardingStrategy
    Deprecated as of Hibernate Search 4.4. Might be removed in Search 5. Use ShardIdentifierProvider instead.
    org.hibernate.search.query.dsl.MoreLikeThisContext
    See QueryBuilder.moreLikeThis()
    org.hibernate.search.query.dsl.MoreLikeThisMatchingContext
    See QueryBuilder.moreLikeThis()
    org.hibernate.search.query.dsl.MoreLikeThisOpenedMatchingContext
    See QueryBuilder.moreLikeThis()
    org.hibernate.search.query.dsl.MoreLikeThisTerminalMatchingContext
    See QueryBuilder.moreLikeThis()
    org.hibernate.search.query.dsl.MoreLikeThisTermination
    See QueryBuilder.moreLikeThis()
    org.hibernate.search.query.dsl.MoreLikeThisToEntityContentAndTermination
    See QueryBuilder.moreLikeThis()
    org.hibernate.search.stat.Statistics
    Statistics will be removed in Hibernate Search 6 without replacement. See this section of the migration guide.
    org.hibernate.search.stat.spi.StatisticsImplementor
    See Statistics
    org.hibernate.search.bridge.TikaMetadataProcessor
    See TikaBridge
    org.hibernate.search.bridge.TikaParseContextProvider
    See TikaBridge
    org.hibernate.search.bridge.TikaParserProvider
    See TikaBridge
    org.hibernate.search.store.Workspace
    This interface will be moved and should be considered non-public API [HSEARCH-1915]
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    org.hibernate.search.cfg.AnalyzerDefMapping
    See AnalyzerDef
    org.hibernate.search.cfg.CharFilterDefMapping
    See AnalyzerDef
    org.hibernate.search.elasticsearch.analyzer.ElasticsearchCharFilterFactory
    See AnalyzerDef
    org.hibernate.search.elasticsearch.analyzer.ElasticsearchTokenFilterFactory
    See AnalyzerDef
    org.hibernate.search.elasticsearch.analyzer.ElasticsearchTokenizerFactory
    See AnalyzerDef
    org.hibernate.search.filter.FilterKey
    Custom filter keys are deprecated and are scheduled for removal in Hibernate Search 6. As of Hibernate Search 5.1, keys for caching Lucene filters are calculated automatically based on the given filter parameters.
    org.hibernate.search.cfg.NormalizerDefMapping
    See AnalyzerDef
    org.hibernate.search.filter.StandardFilterKey
    Custom filter keys are deprecated and are scheduled for removal in Hibernate Search 6. As of Hibernate Search 5.1, keys for caching Lucene filters are calculated automatically based on the given filter parameters.
    org.hibernate.search.bridge.builtin.TikaBridge
    See TikaBridge
    org.hibernate.search.cfg.TokenFilterDefMapping
    See AnalyzerDef
  • Deprecated Enums 
    Enum and Description
    org.hibernate.search.annotations.FieldCacheType
    Remove the annotation. No alternative replacement necessary.
  • Deprecated Annotation Types 
    Annotation Type and Description
    org.hibernate.search.annotations.AnalyzerDef
    Support for annotation-based analyzer or normalizer definitions will be removed in Hibernate Search 6. Use a LuceneAnalysisDefinitionProvider, or a org.hibernate.search.elasticsearch.analyzer.definition.ElasticsearchAnalysisDefinitionProvider.
    org.hibernate.search.annotations.AnalyzerDefs
    See AnalyzerDef
    org.hibernate.search.annotations.Boost
    Index-time boosting will not be possible anymore starting from Lucene 7. You should use query-time boosting instead, for instance by calling boostedTo(float) when building queries with the Hibernate Search query DSL.
    org.hibernate.search.annotations.CacheFromIndex
    Remove the annotation. No alternative replacement necessary.
    org.hibernate.search.annotations.CharFilterDef
    See AnalyzerDef
    org.hibernate.search.annotations.DynamicBoost
    Index-time boosting will not be possible anymore starting from Lucene 7. You should use query-time boosting instead, for instance by calling boostedTo(float) when building queries with the Hibernate Search query DSL.
    org.hibernate.search.annotations.Key
    Custom filter cache keys are a deprecated feature scheduled to be removed in Hibernate Search 6. As of Hibernate Search 5.1, filter cache keys will be determinated automatically based on the filter parameters. Custom filter cache key methods should therefore be removed.
    org.hibernate.search.annotations.NormalizerDef
    See AnalyzerDef
    org.hibernate.search.annotations.NormalizerDefs
    See AnalyzerDef
    org.hibernate.search.annotations.ProvidedId
    with no replacement: this annotation will be removed.
    org.hibernate.search.annotations.TikaBridge
    Support for Tika bridges will be removed in Hibernate Search 6. See this section of the migrationg guide.
    org.hibernate.search.annotations.TokenFilterDef
    See AnalyzerDef
    org.hibernate.search.annotations.TokenizerDef
    See AnalyzerDef
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    org.hibernate.search.filter.FilterCachingStrategy.addCachedFilter(FilterKey, Filter)
    This method is not used by Hibernate Search anymore and will be removed in a future version. Please implement FilterCachingStrategy.addCachedFilter(FilterKey, Query) instead.
    org.hibernate.search.store.ShardIdentifierProviderTemplate.addShard(String)
    Support for dynamic sharding will be removed in Hibernate Search 6. Future-proof implementations must not call this method and must make sure the list of shards is fully defined on startup (ShardIdentifierProviderTemplate.loadInitialShardNames(Properties, BuildContext)).
    org.hibernate.search.cfg.FieldBridgeMapping.analyzer(Class<?>)
    See FieldMapping.analyzer(Class)
    org.hibernate.search.cfg.FieldMapping.analyzer(Class<?>)
    Support for direct references to analyzer implementations by class will be removed in Hibernate Search 6. Use FieldMapping.analyzer(String) instead.
    org.hibernate.search.cfg.IndexedClassBridgeMapping.analyzer(Class<?>)
    See FieldMapping.analyzer(Class)
    org.hibernate.search.cfg.ClassBridgeMapping.analyzer(Class<?>)
    See FieldMapping.analyzer(Class)
    org.hibernate.search.cfg.PropertyLongitudeMapping.analyzerDef(String, Class<? extends TokenizerFactory>)

    See AnalyzerDef

    See AnalyzerDef

    See AnalyzerDef

    See AnalyzerDef

    See AnalyzerDef

    See AnalyzerDef
    org.hibernate.search.cfg.IndexEmbeddedMapping.analyzerDef(String, String, Class<? extends TokenizerFactory>)

    org.hibernate.search.cfg.EntitySpatialMapping.analyzerDef(String, String, Class<? extends TokenizerFactory>)
    See AnalyzerDef
    org.hibernate.search.query.dsl.sort.SortAdditionalSortFieldContext.andByField(String, SortField.Type)
    Using this method shouldn't be needed if your custom field bridges implement MetadataProvidingFieldBridge. Use SortAdditionalSortFieldContext.andByField(String) instead.
    org.hibernate.search.engine.spi.AbstractDocumentBuilder.appendContainedInWorkForInstance(Object, WorkPlan, ContainedInRecursionContext)
    Use AbstractDocumentBuilder.appendContainedInWorkForInstance(Object, WorkPlan, ContainedInRecursionContext, String) instead, and pass the appropriate tenant ID.
    org.hibernate.search.FullTextSharedSessionBuilder.autoClose(boolean)
    org.hibernate.search.cfg.FieldBridgeMapping.boost(float)
    Index-time boosting will not be possible anymore starting from Lucene 7. You should use query-time boosting instead, for instance by calling boostedTo(float) when building queries with the Hibernate Search query DSL.
    org.hibernate.search.cfg.IndexedMapping.boost(float)
    Index-time boosting will not be possible anymore starting from Lucene 7. You should use query-time boosting instead, for instance by calling boostedTo(float) when building queries with the Hibernate Search query DSL.
    org.hibernate.search.cfg.FieldMapping.boost(float)
    Index-time boosting will not be possible anymore starting from Lucene 7. You should use query-time boosting instead, for instance by calling boostedTo(float) when building queries with the Hibernate Search query DSL.
    org.hibernate.search.cfg.IndexedClassBridgeMapping.boost(float)
    Index-time boosting will not be possible anymore starting from Lucene 7. You should use query-time boosting instead, for instance by calling boostedTo(float) when building queries with the Hibernate Search query DSL.
    org.hibernate.search.cfg.PropertySpatialMapping.boost(float)
    Index-time boosting will not be possible anymore starting from Lucene 7. You should use query-time boosting instead, for instance by calling boostedTo(float) when building queries with the Hibernate Search query DSL.
    org.hibernate.search.cfg.EntityMapping.boost(float)
    Index-time boosting will not be possible anymore starting from Lucene 7. You should use query-time boosting instead, for instance by calling boostedTo(float) when building queries with the Hibernate Search query DSL.
    org.hibernate.search.cfg.ClassBridgeMapping.boost(float)
    Index-time boosting will not be possible anymore starting from Lucene 7. You should use query-time boosting instead, for instance by calling boostedTo(float) when building queries with the Hibernate Search query DSL.
    org.hibernate.search.cfg.EntitySpatialMapping.boost(float)
    Index-time boosting will not be possible anymore starting from Lucene 7. You should use query-time boosting instead, for instance by calling boostedTo(float) when building queries with the Hibernate Search query DSL.
    org.hibernate.search.query.dsl.sort.SortContext.byField(String, SortField.Type)
    Using this method shouldn't be needed if your custom field bridges implement MetadataProvidingFieldBridge. Use SortContext.byField(String) instead.
    org.hibernate.search.cfg.IndexedMapping.cacheFromIndex(FieldCacheType...)
    This will be removed with no replacement.
    org.hibernate.search.FullTextSharedSessionBuilder.connectionReleaseMode()
    org.hibernate.search.FullTextSharedSessionBuilder.connectionReleaseMode(ConnectionReleaseMode)
    org.hibernate.search.cfg.IndexedMapping.dynamicBoost(Class<? extends BoostStrategy>)
    Index-time boosting will not be possible anymore starting from Lucene 7. You should use query-time boosting instead, for instance by calling boostedTo(float) when building queries with the Hibernate Search query DSL.
    org.hibernate.search.cfg.PropertyMapping.dynamicBoost(Class<? extends BoostStrategy>)
    Index-time boosting will not be possible anymore starting from Lucene 7. You should use query-time boosting instead, for instance by calling boostedTo(float) when building queries with the Hibernate Search query DSL.
    org.hibernate.search.cfg.EntityMapping.dynamicBoost(Class<? extends BoostStrategy>)
    Index-time boosting will not be possible anymore starting from Lucene 7. You should use query-time boosting instead, for instance by calling boostedTo(float) when building queries with the Hibernate Search query DSL.
    org.hibernate.search.query.engine.spi.HSQuery.filter(Filter)
    use the FullTextFilterDef approach, or handle filtering when building the query (see BooleanJunction.must(Query) and MustJunction.disableScoring()).
    org.hibernate.search.query.dsl.QueryCustomization.filteredBy(Filter)
    Lucene Filters have been deprecated and will be removed in a future version. Please use Queries instead of Filters and use QueryCustomization.filteredBy(Query) instead of this method.
    org.hibernate.search.FullTextSharedSessionBuilder.flushBeforeCompletion()
    org.hibernate.search.FullTextSharedSessionBuilder.flushBeforeCompletion(boolean)
    org.hibernate.search.spi.IndexedTypeMap.get(Class<?>)
    use IndexedTypeMap.get(IndexedTypeIdentifier). This method will be removed.
    org.hibernate.search.bridge.LuceneOptions.getBoost()
    Index-time boosting will not be possible anymore starting from Lucene 7. You should use query-time boosting instead, for instance by calling boostedTo(float) when building queries with the Hibernate Search query DSL.
    org.hibernate.search.cfg.EntityDescriptor.getBoost()
    Index-time boosting will not be possible anymore starting from Lucene 7. You should use query-time boosting instead, for instance by calling boostedTo(float) when building queries with the Hibernate Search query DSL.
    org.hibernate.search.filter.FilterCachingStrategy.getCachedFilter$$bridge$$FilterReturnType(FilterKey)
    This method is only here so that Hibernate Search build tools can generate bytecode allowing to preserve binary compatibility with applications written for Hibernate Search 5.5. It will be removed in a future version. Please implement FilterCachingStrategy.getCachedFilter(FilterKey) instead.
    org.hibernate.search.cfg.EntityDescriptor.getCacheInMemory()
    This will be removed with no replacement.
    org.hibernate.search.metadata.IndexedTypeDescriptor.getDynamicBoost()
    Index-time boosting will not be possible anymore starting from Lucene 7. You should use query-time boosting instead, for instance by calling boostedTo(float) when building queries with the Hibernate Search query DSL.
    org.hibernate.search.cfg.EntityDescriptor.getDynamicBoost()
    Index-time boosting will not be possible anymore starting from Lucene 7. You should use query-time boosting instead, for instance by calling boostedTo(float) when building queries with the Hibernate Search query DSL.
    org.hibernate.search.cfg.PropertyDescriptor.getDynamicBoost()
    Index-time boosting will not be possible anymore starting from Lucene 7. You should use query-time boosting instead, for instance by calling boostedTo(float) when building queries with the Hibernate Search query DSL.
    org.hibernate.search.backend.LuceneWork.getEntityClass()
    use LuceneWork.getEntityType(): this method will be removed!
    org.hibernate.search.query.engine.spi.HSQuery.getExtendedSearchIntegrator()
    should be at most SearchIntegrator, preferably removed altogether
    org.hibernate.search.query.engine.spi.FacetManager.getFacetGroup(String)
    See FacetSelection
    org.hibernate.search.engine.spi.DocumentBuilderIndexedEntity.getFieldCacheOption()
    org.hibernate.search.metadata.IndexedTypeDescriptor.getFieldsForProperty(String)
    Support for retrieving information about indexed properties will be removed in Hibernate Search 6. Only information about index fields will be exposed.
    org.hibernate.search.metadata.IndexedTypeDescriptor.getIndexedProperties()
    Support for retrieving information about indexed properties will be removed in Hibernate Search 6. Only information about index fields will be exposed. To retrieve a list of index fields, use FieldContributor.getIndexedFields() instead.
    org.hibernate.search.spi.IndexedTypeIdentifier.getPojoType()
    This only exists to facilitate an iterative integration, and will be removed ASAP.
    org.hibernate.search.metadata.IndexedTypeDescriptor.getProperty(String)
    Support for retrieving information about indexed properties will be removed in Hibernate Search 6. Only information about index fields will be exposed. To retrieve a particular index fields, use IndexedTypeDescriptor.getIndexedField(String) instead.
    org.hibernate.search.indexes.spi.IndexManager.getSerializer()
    This method is scheduled for removal. It is not invoked by Hibernate Search any more, implementations may make this a no-op and safely return null.
    org.hibernate.search.store.ShardIdentifierProvider.getShardIdentifiersForDeletion(Class<?>, Serializable, String)
    Support for dynamic sharding will be removed in Hibernate Search 6. Future-proof implementations must not override this method.
    org.hibernate.search.store.ShardIdentifierProviderTemplate.getShardIdentifiersForDeletion(Class<?>, Serializable, String)
    Support for dynamic sharding will be removed in Hibernate Search 6. Future-proof implementations must not override this method.
    org.hibernate.search.store.ShardIdentifierProvider.getShardIdentifiersForQuery(FullTextFilterImplementor[])
    Support for dynamic sharding will be removed in Hibernate Search 6. Future-proof implementations must not override this method.
    org.hibernate.search.store.ShardIdentifierProviderTemplate.getShardIdentifiersForQuery(FullTextFilterImplementor[])
    Support for dynamic sharding will be removed in Hibernate Search 6. Future-proof implementations must not override this method.
    org.hibernate.search.metadata.IndexedTypeDescriptor.getStaticBoost()
    Index-time boosting will not be possible anymore starting from Lucene 7. You should use query-time boosting instead, for instance by calling boostedTo(float) when building queries with the Hibernate Search query DSL.
    org.hibernate.search.SearchFactory.getStatistics()
    See Statistics
    org.hibernate.search.metadata.IndexedTypeDescriptor.getType()
    Use IndexedTypeDescriptor.getIndexedType() instead. This method will be removed.
    org.hibernate.search.backend.spi.BackendQueueProcessor.initialize(Properties, WorkerBuildContext, IndexManager)
    Use a Backend implementation and implement your initialization logic in Backend.createQueueProcessor(IndexManager, WorkerBuildContext) instead.
    org.hibernate.search.metadata.IndexedTypeDescriptor.isSharded()
    Support for retrieving this information will be removed in Hibernate Search 6.
    org.hibernate.search.query.dsl.QueryBuilder.moreLikeThis()
    Support for more-like-this queries will be removed in Hibernate Search 6. See this section of the migration guide.
    org.hibernate.search.cfg.FieldMapping.normalizer(Class<?>)
    Support for direct references to normalizer implementations by class will be removed in Hibernate Search 6. Use FieldMapping.normalizer(String) instead.
    org.hibernate.search.cfg.PropertyLongitudeMapping.normalizerDef(String)
    See AnalyzerDef
    org.hibernate.search.cfg.SearchMapping.normalizerDef(String)
    See AnalyzerDef
    org.hibernate.search.cfg.FieldBridgeMapping.normalizerDef(String)
    See AnalyzerDef
    org.hibernate.search.cfg.IndexedMapping.normalizerDef(String)
    See AnalyzerDef
    org.hibernate.search.cfg.DocumentIdMapping.normalizerDef(String)
    See AnalyzerDef
    org.hibernate.search.cfg.PropertyLatitudeMapping.normalizerDef(String)
    See AnalyzerDef
    org.hibernate.search.cfg.ContainedInMapping.normalizerDef(String)
    See AnalyzerDef
    org.hibernate.search.cfg.FieldMapping.normalizerDef(String)
    See AnalyzerDef
    org.hibernate.search.cfg.PropertyMapping.normalizerDef(String)
    See AnalyzerDef
    org.hibernate.search.cfg.IndexedClassBridgeMapping.normalizerDef(String)
    See AnalyzerDef
    org.hibernate.search.cfg.PropertySpatialMapping.normalizerDef(String)
    See AnalyzerDef
    org.hibernate.search.cfg.EntityMapping.normalizerDef(String)
    See AnalyzerDef
    org.hibernate.search.cfg.CalendarBridgeMapping.normalizerDef(String)
    See AnalyzerDef
    org.hibernate.search.cfg.ClassBridgeMapping.normalizerDef(String)
    See AnalyzerDef
    org.hibernate.search.cfg.FullTextFilterDefMapping.normalizerDef(String)
    See AnalyzerDef
    org.hibernate.search.cfg.ProvidedIdMapping.normalizerDef(String)
    See AnalyzerDef
    org.hibernate.search.cfg.DateBridgeMapping.normalizerDef(String)
    See AnalyzerDef
    org.hibernate.search.cfg.IndexEmbeddedMapping.normalizerDef(String)
    See AnalyzerDef
    org.hibernate.search.cfg.EntitySpatialMapping.normalizerDef(String)
    See AnalyzerDef
    org.hibernate.search.cfg.ContainedInMapping.numericField()
    Invoke field().numericField() instead.
    org.hibernate.search.spi.IndexedTypeMap.put(IndexedTypeIdentifier, V)
    This method will be removed. The implementations will be refactored to become immutable.
    org.hibernate.search.cfg.EntityDescriptor.setBoost(Map<String, Object>)
    Index-time boosting will not be possible anymore starting from Lucene 7. You should use query-time boosting instead, for instance by calling boostedTo(float) when building queries with the Hibernate Search query DSL.
    org.hibernate.search.cfg.EntityDescriptor.setCacheInMemory(Map<String, Object>)
    This will be removed with no replacement.
    org.hibernate.search.cfg.EntityDescriptor.setDynamicBoost(Map<String, Object>)
    Index-time boosting will not be possible anymore starting from Lucene 7. You should use query-time boosting instead, for instance by calling boostedTo(float) when building queries with the Hibernate Search query DSL.
    org.hibernate.search.cfg.PropertyDescriptor.setDynamicBoost(Map<String, Object>)
    Index-time boosting will not be possible anymore starting from Lucene 7. You should use query-time boosting instead, for instance by calling boostedTo(float) when building queries with the Hibernate Search query DSL.
    org.hibernate.search.FullTextQuery.setFilter(Filter)
    org.hibernate.search.jpa.FullTextQuery.setFilter(Filter)
    use the FullTextFilterDef approach, or use a BooleanQuery and add a clause using BooleanClause.Occur.FILTER.
    org.hibernate.search.FullTextQuery.setResultTransformer(ResultTransformer)
    org.hibernate.search.MassIndexer.threadsForSubsequentFetching(int)
    Being ignored: this method will be removed.
    org.hibernate.search.spi.IndexedTypeSet.toPojosSet()
    This only exists to facilitate an iterative integration, and will be removed ASAP.
    org.hibernate.search.FullTextSharedSessionBuilder.transactionContext()
    org.hibernate.search.query.dsl.FuzzyContext.withThreshold(float)
    use FuzzyContext.withEditDistanceUpTo(int)
  • Deprecated Constructors 
    Constructor and Description
    org.hibernate.search.cfg.NumericFieldMapping(PropertyDescriptor, EntityDescriptor, SearchMapping)
    Do not use constructors, use numericField methods in other classes from the same package.
    org.hibernate.search.cfg.NumericFieldMapping(String, PropertyDescriptor, EntityDescriptor, SearchMapping)
    Do not use constructors, use numericField methods in other classes from the same package.
  • Deprecated Annotation Type Elements 
    Annotation Type Element and Description
    org.hibernate.search.annotations.Spatial.boost
    Index-time boosting will not be possible anymore starting from Lucene 7. You should use query-time boosting instead, for instance by calling boostedTo(float) when building queries with the Hibernate Search query DSL.
    org.hibernate.search.annotations.Field.boost
    Index-time boosting will not be possible anymore starting from Lucene 7. You should use query-time boosting instead, for instance by calling boostedTo(float) when building queries with the Hibernate Search query DSL.
    org.hibernate.search.annotations.Normalizer.impl
    Support for direct references to analyzer implementations by class will be removed in Hibernate Search 6. Use Normalizer.definition() instead.
    org.hibernate.search.annotations.Analyzer.impl
    Support for direct references to analyzer implementations by class will be removed in Hibernate Search 6. Use Analyzer.definition() instead.
